scripts.pkg: npm run pkg-x86_64 && npm run pkg-arm64
scripts.pkg-x86_64: pkg -o dist/podman-wsl-service-x86_64 -t node22-linux-x64 --options "disable-warning=DEP0060" --public -C brotli -c package.json index.mjs
scripts.pkg-arm64: pkg -o dist/podman-wsl-service-arm64 -t node22-linux-arm64 --options "disable-warning=DEP0060" --public -C brotli -c package.json index.mjs
